chunks.en: How do you choose a mobile phone plan now?
Are you still using expensive plans, or are you using one for number preservation and one for data?
I see that my friends around me have all switched to using two cards.
Number preservation + 29 yuan long-term data plan, also promoting the one I use myself: https://172.lot-ml.com/ProductEn/Index/1f1164a8d16f8be7
One old China Mobile card changed to an 8 yuan plan.
One 29 yuan data plan card, considering switching to a 19 yuan data plan card.
Focusing on saving money.
By the way, for Beijing V users who see this post, I recommend the plan link in the following link: https://jsj.top/f/AZY6l4
Free application channel: QQ group 817226839
@cksspk #1 Asking a question,
My Telegram is full of pornographic content. Are there any normal and interesting group chats? I want to use normal Telegram. Any keyword in the group robot is full of porn. I can't stand it.
@MrQSJ #28 Yes, it's only third-party, and the third-party also cooperates with the official.
But the official package will not offer this type of data plan.

chunks.en: Already four cards, one old card is bound to many things, one data card, one card is used to receive company internet SMS, and one Telegram code card.
I'm dizzy.

China Unicom main card 79 + 4 + value-added service 20 - recharge rebate 25 + secondary card 10 = 88, data is 55 (can be carried over) + 115 within the province + value-added gift 3 + 30 targeted + minimum consumption gift 15, total 218 (excluding targeted 188)
Backup receive express delivery China Mobile 39 - 30 (half-year discount), and then switch to 8 after half a year.
Total of 97
8 yuan China Mobile old card for number preservation + 29 data card (155g),
Planning to change the data card to a 19 yuan one, although it can only be used for one or two years, then change it again.
One for number preservation, one for data.
After changing it myself, I also helped my family change it, reducing costs is the right thing to do.
One China Mobile main card for 10 yuan number preservation, one 29 yuan China Mobile data card.
Does the combination of number preservation + data not have call time?

China Telecom Star Card 49 325GB data is used as broadband.
